body.name: Molasus Women's Cotton Underwear High Waisted Full Coverage Ladies Panties (Regular & Plus Size)
features: Fabric type 95% Combed Cotton,5% Spandex blended fabric

Care instructions Hand Wash or Machine Wash with laundry bag (30°C Max).We recommend hang drying your Underwear to Ensure a long-lasting fit of the underwear and avoid Pre-shrinking,extend the life of your garment.

Cotton Stretch full coverage underwear, no pilling, no pinching, no binding,no panty lines, not too tight but not loose, the high waisted underwear offers a bit of tummy support and reduces the appearance of muffin top.

Double-layer Covered waistband(About 2cm elastic inside.) sits right at the belly button. No rolling or bunching, with no compression, perfectly snug but not tight, durable and stretchy but not easy to be deformed.

No riding up underpants with double-layer crotch for added protection, sweat wicking, breathable & healthy.Especially for those who are new mothers the end of pregnancy and post partum,, helping post partum C-Section recovery and post maternity.

Soft & Comfortable Cotton Panties - Fits legs snugly without cutting, waist elasticity does not cut or dig.Adopting the most advanced technology (Steam Pre-shrinking) to ensure that the underwear will last fit.Best choice of female friends/mothers/grandmas.

Stay In Place Cotton Briefs: Comfortable to wear all day long,Avoid embarrassing adjustment during the day Especially when working out at the gym.not sexy but just comfortable. Nice alternative to "granny panty" type briefs.

Preshrunk for lasting fit Bind-proof leg openings Slight structure in the belly area Hide the muffin top No ride up panties Low cut design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently had surgery and needed an ileostomy put in. The location of it and the swelling in my stomach made it so my underwear was no longer comfortable. I ordered a few different varieties and I swear these are the best underwear by far that I've had ever. They are stretchy enough to accommodate things but they don't get weird and baggy. The cut fits comfortably on my leg and stomach and I can tuck the ostomy bag in or wear it out with these. They allow for movement without riding up or slipping down. I love them so much I am replacing all my everyday underwear with them. There's no weird waist band and the material is nice and thick. They also washed well but shrank just a little in the dryer. It you are looking for comfortable underwear you can move in and that can accommodate bloated days and normal days these are great and I totally think they are worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I live for cotton everything, & these panties do a great job in all clothing categories: fit, form, function, & looks. The manufacturer recommends air drying, but I just buy a size bigger & toss them in the dryer with no adverse consequences. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these underwear. They have great coverage, fit comfortably on my stomach, and are a nice thicker material. That means they also hold up well! I will continue to be a repeat purchaser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great, love em
reviews.reviewText: these are comfortable and easy to wear. the waist band is comfy. they wash good, they came out of the dryer a little tiny bit wrinkled but i didnt care, theyll probably last longer if i dont heat dry them. i had looked at some real cheap ones, and almost got them. i m glad i got these, they are worth th e price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality cotton with a very good fit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FINALLY! Comfortable panties for imperfect figures!
reviews.reviewText: In the 10 years since menopause I have had a poochy belly. But I swim regularly so my backside and thighs are not fat. I have had SO much trouble finding panties that I don’t want to throw out by the end of a workday. Til these!Other panties: If they fit my bottom and thighs they’re a nightmare on my belly; they either roll down, or they compress my gut in an extremely uncomfortable way. If they fit my belly the leg holes flap around in a very irritating way. Yuck.THESE panties are like a hug! They fit everywhere! The leg holes don’t gap, the waistband stays up, and they feel like they’re gently containing my belly jiggles but not ever compressing to the point of GI distress.10 stars. Love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Maybe TMI, but I grew up with Carter Spanky Pants...
reviews.reviewText: ...women of a certain age will know what I am talking about.Back in the 'olden days' little girls started with cotton briefs (aka granny panties).Comfortable, cotton, inexpensive served their purpose perfectly--and were most likely all that was available in the aforementioned 'olden days'.Continued to buy this style for decades. Different brands, but all cotton briefs.I like them. Dependable, comfortable, familiar and easy to find (up to a certain size).Many years later, (after I had starved my 5'8" self down to 126lbs) a woman young enough to be my daughter suggested I try hipsters--sexier, cuter, wouldn't show at waistline (mine didn't anyway but she was trying to be helpful).I have always struggled with my weight, so accentuating my hips wasn't anything I ever wanted to do, butsince I was now skinny, I tried them. They were okay, but never really comfortable, I missed my grannies!With the passage of time and circumstrances, I started to gain weight again.Hipsters were becoming very uncomfortable, and gave me extra bumps and bulges at the hipline--ugh!I had to keep buying bigger panties: From 2016 to 2024, I have accumulated a vast collection of 7s, 8s, 10s and now 3X.NONE of them were ever as comfortable as Molasus briefs.So glad I found these, and as I continue to lose weight again from my now 5'7"/198lb frame (working very hard at it) I plan to buy more of these in descending sizes.Sexy undies for certain occasions may be okay, but since I have attained the age where comfort means a whole lot more than 'sexy' panties no one ever sees.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice material, very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pack a few days ago.The fabric is so soft and nice. Very comfortable,The style fits perfectly.True to the size

My midwife recommended I buy some “really big granny panties” for postpartum. So I went to Walmart and bought a pack of cheapo cotton underwear. Well let me tell you the fit was terrible and the bands cut in so uncomfortably, especially after a c-section. Then I bought another pack, and another, and still no luck and lots of discomfort. I was instead living in disposables but knew that couldn’t last forever!Finally I found these and let me tell you, game changer!!! These panties are soooo comfortable. The extra wide waist band is super stretchy and doesn’t cut in to your postpartum tummy. They are the perfect high-waisted cut so won’t interfere with c-section recovery. Plus they are surprisingly flattering, I really love how they look and feel. I would definitely buy again and will wear these well past the postpartum stage!True to size with the sizing chart, I bought a large and they’ve comfortably stretched to fit when my tummy was larger, and now as it’s shrunk down a bit.

reviews.reviewTitle: Creo que las voy a amar.
reviews.reviewText: Amazon excelente en tiempos y cuidado del paquete.Elegí talla G, normalmente escojo talla XG, pero leí los comentarios y vi que daban de sí (ver la en la foto de la modelo que estira la ropa interior); por lo que tampoco quería que fueran enormes y me animé a una talla más pequeña y en mi caso esta bien.Me gustó la textura de la tela, no les encontré defectos a simple vista. Sí son algo estrechas en la pierna si tienes la pierna gorda y hermosa como yo, tómalo en cuenta. Yo normalmente prefiero las que no tienen costuras pero adquirí este producto para la comodidad de la casa y creo que serán mis favoritas. En el área de la cadera cumplen su función, altas y cubren la lonjita y no se bajan.Esta es una impresión inicial de sólo verlas y probarme una, aún no las uso.Los colores corresponden a la descripción.Después de varias lavadas y uso daré mi opinión nuevamente.

reviews.reviewTitle: The product is totally worth the price
reviews.reviewText: It's a good quality product. Soft cotton fabric and gives more coverage. This combo pack is totally worth the price👍
